lead_paragraph: GLASS--David C. September 17, 1930-June 2, 2016. Died unexpectedly at the age of 85. Survived by his wife Kathleen Kehoe Glass and sister Mary Ellen Ashley Rubin. Funeral Service Saturday, June 18th at 11am, at Christ Church Riverdale, 5030 Henry Hudson Parkway East. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GLASS, DAVID C

snippet: GLASS--David C. September 17, 1930-June 2, 2016. Died unexpectedly at the age of 85. Survived by his wife Kathleen Kehoe Glass and sister Mary Ellen Ashley Rubin. Funeral Service Saturday, June 18th at 11am, at Christ Church Riverdale, 5030 Henry Hudson Parkway East. 1/3
